text: [Music]
hello my name is mriganko a support team
member here at the aws office in
bangalore
today i am going to show you how a peer
account can remove a linked account in
aws organizations from one organization
so it can join a different organization
let's get started
one of the tasks that you manage as part
of an organization in aws organizations
is adding and removing linked accounts
also referred to as member accounts
today i'll show you how a peer account
can remove a linked account in order to
be invited to join a different
organization
i'll also discuss the basic requirements
to complete the migration successfully
step one
removing a linked account from your
organization as a pair
one fws account cannot be part of more
than one organization at the same time
so to assign a linked account in aws
organizations that's in your
organization so it can become assigned
to another organization
you must first remove the linked account
from your organization
after the linked account is removed
it can operate as a standalone account
and can be invited to join another
organization
here are the steps a pair of an aws
organization can take to remove a member
account
log in to your peer account console
using an aws user with appropriate
impermissions to add and remove linked
accounts in aws organizations
search for aws organizations and then
choose it
this redirects you to your
organization's page
in the organization page
you will see the complete list of linked
accounts within your consolidated
billing family
use the search option to filter out the
linked account that you want to remove
using its account id or email address
select the linked account by selecting
the check box next to the account
then
choose the remove account button to
delink the account
note that for you to remove the linked
account in aws organizations from the
organization
the account must meet the requirements
to be a standalone account
if it doesn't
you will see this error message
these are the requirements that you must
check before you try to delink or remove
the account
you added a valid payment method to the
account
you verify the phone number on the
account
you accepted the aws customer agreement
you selected an aws support plan
when the requirements are fulfilled
the pair account of the organization can
remove the member account successfully
by using the aws organization's console
or a member account can remove
themselves from the aws organization if
their account meets the criteria or
being a standalone account
step 2 inviting a standalone aws account
to join your organization
a fare account of an organization can
invite standalone accounts to join their
organization
here are the steps to perform this
action
login to your peer accounts aws console
then go to the aws organizations page
choose the add account button and then
choose the invite account button
enter the email address or the account
id that you want to invite
and then choose the invite button to
send the invitation
the invited account must login to their
account and then go to the aws
organizations page in their console
the linked account
needs to review the invitation
notification and choose the accept
button to join the organization
some basic checks
before you remove an account from an
organization
check if the account that you are
removing has active reserve instances or
savings plans
that are shared across the organization
when an account is removed the
organization and other member accounts
will stop receiving the reserve
instances and savings plans benefits
from the removed account
before you start to make a member
account into a standalone account
request aws support to assist you in
migrating the reserve instances and
savings plans to another account within
your organization before removing the
member account
billing history and billing reports for
all accounts stay with the pair account
in an organization
before you move the account to a new
organization
download any billing or report history
for the member account that you want to
keep
this might include constant usage
reports
detailed billing reports
or reports generated by cost explorer
update the text settings page of the
linked account as for the pair details
if required
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at aws
[Music]
